channel.title: How do i add d claw spec?
channel.description: how do i add d claw spec

item.title: How do i add d claw spec?
item.dc:creator: @raped_by_who raped by who
item.description:
@raped_by_who wrote:

USE THESE INTS AND BOOLEANS

public boolean DCDamg = false; public int DCdown = 0; public int dclaws = 0;

here’s the spec code >.>

if(playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 8050 && specialAmount > 49){ dclaws = 3; getHit(65); usingSpecial = true; } if(playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 8050 && specialAmount > 49){ specialAtkNPC(true, 75, 282, 2068); DCdown = 4; DCDamg = true; npcDamage(8); }

and here’s your process() code

[CODE]if(dclaws == 3) {
dclawed();
}

if(dclaws == 2) {
startAnimation(2068);
dclawed2();
}

if(dclaws == 1) {
dclawed2();
actionInterval = getbattleTimer() + getbattleTimer()/2;
}

if(dclaws > 0) {
dclaws -= 1;
}[/CODE]

the rest is easy

just follow that part, ignore the first post.

Read full topic

item.title: How do i add d claw spec?
item.dc:creator: @raped_by_who raped by who
item.description:
@raped_by_who wrote:

Steps to making the spec.

  1. Declare all the ints you need (i gave you most, if not all)
  2. Start with the DDS spec.
  3. Instead of making the DDS spec only load 2 hits, add in the ints i gave you, and make it hit 4 times.

It’s better you learn how to do all the technical things yourself
Ill go find you all of the ints 100% >.>[br][br][size=1]Posted on: August 09, 2009, 02:52:42 pm[/size][hr]USE THESE INTS AND BOOLEANS

public boolean DCDamg = false; public int DCdown = 0; public int dclaws = 0;

here’s the spec code >.>

if(playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 8050 && specialAmount > 49){ dclaws = 3; getHit(65); usingSpecial = true; } if(playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 8050 && specialAmount > 49){ specialAtkNPC(true, 75, 282, 2068); DCdown = 4; DCDamg = true; npcDamage(8); }

and here’s your process() code

[CODE]if(dclaws == 3) {
dclawed();
}

if(dclaws == 2) {
startAnimation(2068);
dclawed2();
}

if(dclaws == 1) {
dclawed2();
actionInterval = getbattleTimer() + getbattleTimer()/2;
}

if(dclaws > 0) {
dclaws -= 1;
}[/CODE]

the rest is easy

item.title: How do i add d claw spec?
item.dc:creator: @raped_by_who raped by who
item.description:
@raped_by_who wrote:

  1. It’s only not useful if you dont know 2 shits about java
    2)Noone’s going to spoonfeed you. Learn to do things yourself.

  2. I’ll give you one more hint

public boolean DCDamg = false; public int DCtimer = 0; public int DCDelay = 0; public int DC2Delay = 0; public boolean DC2Damg = false; public int DC2timer = 0; public int DoubleDelay = 0; public int DoubDelay = 0; public boolean DC3Damg = false; public int DC3timer = 0; public int TripleDelay = 0; public int TriDelay = 0; public boolean DC4Damg = false; public int DC4timer = 0; public int FourDelay = 0; public int FouDelay = 0;
